@notice Toggles the pause status using ternary operators
@dev If paused() is true, then we unpause. Else, pause.

@param campaignId The ID of the campaign that we are trying to donate to

@notice Donates ETH to a certain campaign
@param campaignId The ID of the campaign that we are trying to donate to

params.campaignId: The ID of the campaign that we are trying to donate to

endCampaign(bytes32).details: Can only be called by the campaign initiator

params.campaignId: The ID of the campaign that we are trying to end
The ID of the campaign that we are trying to query

returns._0: A struct containing information about the given campaign

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.description: The description of this new campaign (to be displayed on a website, for example)
params.title: The title of this new campaign (to be displayed on a website, for example)

togglePause().details: If paused() is true, then we unpause. Else, pause.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

donateToCampaign(bytes32).notice: Donates ETH to a certain campaign

endCampaign(bytes32).notice: Ends a fundraising campaign, all raised funds transferred to the initiator

getCampaign(bytes32).notice: Returns information for a specific campaign

getCampaignId(address,string,string).notice: Generates a campaign ID given identifying information

togglePause().notice: Toggles the pause status using ternary operators
